= Building and Running =

Scorecard is in its early development stages but is functional and can be used. 
Here's the procedure to get it working:

1) Download and install Grails 1.0.4
http://www.grails.org/Download
set your GRAILS_HOME and include its bin dir in your PATH

2) Checkout the Scorecard sources

svn co https://ops-scorecard.googlecode.com/svn/trunk scorecard

3) Run the application

grails -Dserver.port=9090 run-app
